value:
So this is the land called Askr... It
is filled with kindness. I like it here.

Ljósálfheimr is a land of wonderful
dreams. If you're sad, a pleasant
dream can always cheer you up.

You're giving me quite a look! Oh,
it's my wings, isn't it? They're not
so common around here, are they?

Our world exists only because people
dream... Ljósálfheimr was born thanks
to mortals.

I like mortals, and I like you in
particular. I want to use dreams
to make you as happy as I can!

My name's Peony. I come from the
land of beautiful dreams...with a
lovely dream, just for you.

Maybe I'm just a little tired...
Good night!

Thank you so much! This makes me
more than a little bit happy.

I am Peony, and I come from the
land where good dreams are born. I
will do my best to bring them to you.

Do you remember what you were
like when you were small? Were you
a happy child? A gentle one?$k$pLjósálfar like me are very close with
children. We play with them, hide
treasures for them to find...$k$pWe have a lot of fun. But when
they grow up, they forget all about
us. You did—didn't you?$k$pIt's OK. That's part of becoming an
adult. Even if you all forget me, I still
care about all of you.$k$pMaybe you can come and enjoy
some pleasant dreams with me
in Ljósálfheimr! Someday...
Hello! I'm Peony. I come from Ljósálfheimr, the land of the light elves.
Yah! Oh, don't be mean! You scared me.
When mortal children grow up, they forget all about us...
Why… Why do I want to cry whenever someone says the word "sister"?
I love to chat, and I'm always ready for fun with friends. I hope we get along!
